title: chat restriction @Riot
body: I got a 10 game chat restrict and went from honor 2 to honor 1. Currently have 8 more games until my honor is unlocked again. My question is will i get season rewards after hitting gold 5? Assuming i clear all of the games i mean.

replies.body:
As stated [on the ranked rewards help desk](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk):

>DISQUALIFICATION
>As announced in August, certain players are ineligible for this seasonâ€™s rewards:

> * ***Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends.***
> * Players issued a ban of 7 days or more after Aug 22nd, 23:59 Pacific Time.
> * Players banned for boosting during the 2017 season.

You must complete your chat restriction before the end of the season (at time of posting is just under 28 hours from now). You can see a live countdown clock on the link above.
thank you so much for your help. i wish there was something that i could use to help you get a higher rating in the forums.
No need. I try to help out here when I can. Good luck getting the restriction down!
Ayyyy Modi on point with their answers today ^_^! If the season ends and you still have that chat restriction you won't be getting the rewards.
